posts.text: Such a great feeling to receive an email that I had been chosen to join the ambassadors club for Amdocs! 🚀 #amdocs  Last week marked a strong and successful start, and it's always a pleasure to connect with people from within the company, especially those in different positions. 😎We had the privilege of attending two inspiring talks, led by Noa Rosin  and Noam Feinholtz, PhD  who truly inspired us with their stories and insights. To make it even better, I had the opportunity to explore the new 'Amdocs Park', such an AMAZING place to work 🤩Sharing this video to give you a taste of the energy we experienced, and I can’t wait to share more ⚡️#amdocs #ambassador #ambassadorsclub

I am extremely proud to have been chosen for the Bootcamp for Ethiopians, as one of the mentors for four bright and highly capable young individuals, introducing them to the world of Generative AI and assisting them in creating avatars and images using their own photos. They left our session enchanted, and I, even more so, for being a part of this beautiful inclusion project.I hope that in the near future, one of them may become my colleague or join another department within the company. They deserve a chance, just like anyone else. Companies that embrace inclusivity are better companies. Thanks to Itay and Amdocs, for this opportunity! #amdocs Amdocs
🙏💔🇮🇱 #Stand_with_Us! #israel #standforisrael

🚀 Exciting news! 📣I've earned a golden ticket to the exclusive #amdocs #ambassadors #club. I'm now Amdocs' global ambassador, spreading the word about our innovations and values. As BI Release Manager of #AmdocsDataPlatform, I'm orchestrating amazing data-driven feats. Let's rock this journey together!🤟#AmdocsAmbassadorsClub #DataDrivenOrganization #AmdocsDataOffice

September has always been my favorite month....The Jewish holidays, the improving weather and... it's my birthday! 🎈 This year, I chose to celebrate it abroad thanks to Amdocs' unlimited vacation. It allowed me to go and enjoy large music festival in Munich, with tens of thousands of people. I also got to see a fascinating futuristic car exhibition - #IAA2023.Even during the festival, I encountered in one of the #Amazing things Amdocs is doing: supporting Vodafone's cell-tower which allows full service in crowded areas. It was really cool, because myself also supporting Vodafone's team at Amdocs.The following week has begun with some amazing opportunities for volunteering activities with the great the Finance unit, as part of Amdocs' #CSR.Later on, I had the privilege to join the kick of, and be part of the brand new #AmbassadorsClub, led by the great Ayana Gisser!The session was full of great and interesting workshops and lectures, that eventually supposed to improve our ability to market/express ourselves.Lastly (for now), It was absolutely great to have a toast with great colleagues I support and work with on daily basis, towards the new #JewishYear #RoshHaShana. That obviously included some GREAT sweet stuff which I really really like...So... September is my favorite month. #ShanaTova #HappyNewYear 🍯

In addition to my passion for Finance and Economics, I've always felt excitement and fulfillment speaking out about my country 🇮🇱  in front of interested visitors/friends from around the globe. That's even truer in tuff times like what we currently experiencing here for the first time.This is not a post about the politics of Israel (which are pretty complicated), but about taking a passion that you have and make the best out of it. This is a win-win situation, as I truly enjoy & feel good about what I do, while perhaps/hopefully I changed something in the way people perceive this miss-understood country.Apart of this wonderful opportunity to talk in front of curious amazing people from Germany in Tel-Aviv about the life and situation here, I've also received as a gift my favorite snack from their country 😎 Thanks my dear friend, Dina Roell, for choosing me to talk and meet them.

There's no better way to kick off the new year than through volunteering, and turning dreams into reality – it truly adds to the experience! The first volunteer event of the #YoungProfessionals community at @Amdocs took place just before the holidays. It's incredibly inspiring to witness the positive #impact generated by our dedicated community members 🙌Wishing everyone a fantastic year ahead, brimming with meaningful actions, valuable contributions, and the achievement of your aspirations. Let's make it a year to remember! 🥂🐝Rotem Sharon Inbar Eli Shachar Samuel Yarden Jacobs Ella Tzur Peleg Avraham Adi Hadar Ortal Israel Liran Amilov Celina Schwarz May Greif Eitan Chen Rotem Ashkenazi Liraz Haglili Tehila Yafe

07.10.2023💔😔🇮🇱Yesterday on "Shimhat Tora" ( Jewish Holiday), on holy Shabath, we woke up to a cruel and horrifying reality.Hamas attacked our brothers and sisters from south of Israel in a brutal surprise attack.Over 300 people have been brutally murdered (!) dozens of women, children, elderly people and men have been kidnapped into Gaza strip, yesteday over 3000 missile were luached on Israel and above 1600 Israeli citizen were injured.Stand with us🙏.#israel 🇮🇱#Stand_with_Us!🇮🇱

The New Year's resolution I made this year was to learn something new... Most of the time, it's about improving my professional skills (or my cooking skills). But - “Life is what happens when you're making other plans," said John Lennon...This time I let life lead me, and on Sep 5th, Ayana Gisser wrote me - "#AMDOCS #ambassadors club tomorrow 9:30 am, will you be there?" So I jumped at the opportunity, not knowing I was about to learn something "NEW"! The icing on this cupcake 🧁(well, club) is that Hadar Bismut  is leading it ! As far as I was concerned, at this point it was a no-brainer.Shana Tova my friends, don't miss out on opportunities! 🍏🐝🍎🍯#amdocs #amazing #ambassadors_club #global_ambassadors_community

Just like ISIS !Dear friends, I’d like to share with you our new unfortunate reality.A war was forced upon us by Gaza.You wanna help? Best thing you can do for us is to advocate for Israel. Once we’ll hit Gaza with all our might to free the dozens, maybe even hundreds, of hostages, including babies and old women, there will be some unpleasant sights. When people will start talking about our soon to be “disproportional response”, make sure to remind them that they opened a war by massacring hundreds of civilians including babies in their houses in Israel, and kidnapped dozens. As always personal stories are better than numbers, so here’s one out of hundreds: A family was burned to death in their house. Sorry for being graphic, it is what it is. They are not "freedom fighters".They are not "militants".They are cruel, heartless terrorists just like ISIS. Your loud support means a lot to us.#StandWithIsrael

We’re in year 1895. This photo is from the 1895, 50 secconds(!) movie “Arrival of a Train at La Ciotat Station” by Louis Lumiere. Back then, people at the cinema theater literally jumped off their seats, terrified that the train will come out of the screen and run them over. That is how realistic the experience was. Imagine watching this today 😜I believe that GenAI wise, we’re just at the beginning of 1895. One can only imagine not where we’ll be in a hundred years, but in 100 weeks. And this is even before we’re talking singularity etc… My two cents, at the core of everything and in the end, the human spirit (whatever it will be) and genuine creativity will prevail. Enter “Terminator” soundtrack.#GenAI #Innovation #Creativity

I don’t really look like this, I didn’t write it, I’m not the one who speaks, is it still me?Today I shared with 1,600 Amdocs colleagues how the Marketing organization is pioneering the way with Generative AI as part of Amdocs GenAI Days series of lectures and a hackathon. This video clip was my closing words of this engaging session. As you can see, these are avatars of me, the copy was created with the help of ChatGPT and the narration was created from a sampling of my voice, which is why I don’t have an accent 😜. This begs the question, is it still me? To be philosophical about it, I believe these are other versions of me I can only dream of. Maybe even an extension of oneself. What do you think..?#amdocs #GenAI #MakeItAmazing
How do you know it’s Wednesday?It’s shorts day at Amdocs Marketing!Hillel Geiger  Shannon Zulberg  Gil Rosen  Ayana Gisser  #Amdocs #MakeItAmazing

Happy to take part in Amdocs GenAI Days and present how Amdocs Marketing is harnessing the power of GenAI for increased creativity, productivity and innovation. #GenAI #Amdocs #Marketing #MakeItAmazing

What do Ethiopian cuisine and Generative AI have in common? Today we celebrated the closing session of the Amdocs Corporate Bootcamp for Israelis of Ethiopian Origin. I was privileged to lead the Marketing stream of this bootcamp over six weeks with the most energized, smart and motivated students. With an amazing roster of fellow marketing mentors we took our students through a marketing journey from research and storytelling to product marketing, campaigns, social and creative to Generative AI. What about the Ethiopian cuisine you ask? You had to be there today for the closing event where we enjoyed a wonderful buffet of Ethiopian food. In one word… spicy! A big thank you to all the Marketing mentors who made this bootcamp, well… AMAZING. Menny Raviv Ayana Gisser Ofir Daniel Daniela Lander Barbara Schmukler Maghidman Boris Weissman Shaden Bsharat Amdocs #amdocscareer #makeitamazing

Israel is under attack 😢 Unless you've been on Mars this weekend, you will know that yesterday Hamas terrorists launched a massive and unprovoked attack on Israeli civilian targets. Indiscriminate firing of rockets accompanied the terrorist forces that entered our towns and villages. The reported death toll from this attack has now passed 300 (הי"ד), and many hundreds of wounded. Also civilians have been kidnapped to Gaza.This is a frightful situation for Israeli citizens here and around the world, and it's encouraging to see global political leadership condemn this move.Many people have described this as senseless violence. But the word "senseless" is completely inappropriate here. The evil Hamas leadership (along with their allies) know exactly what they are doing, their publicly stated aims are to kill Jews and destroy the Israel state.My thoughts and prayers are with the security forces who are risking their lives to resolve the situation and to make sure that this horrific assault will not be repeated. And of course I'm thinking of the injured and sending my wishes for their full and speedy recovery.Picture credit - screen grab from the CNN front page Sunday morning#israel #standforisrael #nototerror

Taking a week off for Sukkot (Tabernacles), as I do every year. But easier this year thanks to Amdocs unlimited vacation policy.Enjoying the break but also looking forward to getting back to work on Sunday.Enjoyed plenty of nature walks, including this urban nature stroll by the Yarkon river in Tel Aviv.Was also nice to see the newly opened public garden in the grounds of the Land of Israel Museum in Tel Aviv.#myamdocsvoice #makeitamazing #amdocs #unlimitedvacation #naturewalks

If it's not one festival, it's another 😁 New Year - not so new any moreDay of Atonement - well, hope I have atonedTabernacles (Sukkot) here we come!In preparation for the 8 days to come (starting this Friday evening and ending next Saturday night), I've erected our Sukka (booth) on our balcony.Sukkot is all about leaving our comfort zone (literally) and exposing ourselves to the elements. We remind ourselves of the Exodus, and that we are still on a journey. On the last day (Simhat Tora, next Saturday), we come back into our homes and celebrate the intellectual and spiritual elements of Jewish Law, as we complete the yearly cycle of readings from the Chumash (Pentateuch).I'll be somewhat less active on LinkedIn over the holiday period, so no doubt my SSI score will go down, probably no posts. Watch out for the following Sunday when I plan to be back with a bang, some good things to celebrate (e.g. an Amdocs award from Light Reading in the category Wireless Technology Vendor of the Year).In the meantime wishing Chag Sameach (happy holidays) to anyone who is celebrating Sukkot. Also happy Mawlid to those who have been or will be marking that occasion.#myamdocsvoice #makeitamazing #sukkot #tabernacles #festival #simhattora--------------------------------I'm Jonathan Goldberg, part-time #LinkedIn addict, and doing side work as an integration architect 😁 .Follow me for life at Amdocs, TM Forum, and more. Or bell me 🔔 on my profile.

Who wants to be an Ambassador?With food like this, who wouldn't want!Seems such a long time ago already, what with high and holy days, business travel, and whatnot, but in fact it was only 2 weeks (and one day) ago!Amdocs launched the Amdocs Ambassador Club in Israel, bringing together social media advocates! I'm honored to be considered part of this club, which is slated to be launched in our other geographical areas going forward.It was great to meet my fellow ambassadors, and learn some tricks of the trade from:* Hadar Bismut - who's running the community and acting as professional authority on social media* Noa Rosin - experienced TV presenter and content expert* Noam Feinholtz, PhD - story teller par excellence* And the one and only Ayana Gisser, the planner and originator of the Ambassador club. Thanks for the catering and the giveaway goodiesThanks Gil Rosen (Amdocs CMO) for providing sponsorship to the initiative and giving the opening pitch!Looking forward to additional meetings of the club to get even more tips about effective social media workGood luck to my fellow ambassadors here and abroad, and giving my new year blessings as you start or continue your social media activism:* May your posts be widely viewed* May your engagement be fruitful* May your comments be positive* May your reactions be fulfillingP.S. Did my hook work? What do you think?#myamdocsvoice #makeitamazing #amdocs #socialmedia #ambassador #advocacy--------------------------------I'm Jonathan Goldberg, part-time #LinkedIn addict, and doing side work as an integration architect 😁 .Follow me for life at Amdocs, TM Forum, and more. Or bell me 🔔 on my profile.

My first re-post for a very long time.Breaks all the LinkedIn engagement rules (again), but if the content is good, I'll go for it.My Amdocs colleagues took part in no fewer than five (5) catalysts at the recent TM Forum event DTW23 - Ignite. I visited all 5 stands at #dtw23 and was impressed by the amazing work done in preparation for the event.And guess what, we won awards for two (2) of the catalysts!These projects promote cooperation and collaboration between organizations that are normally competing with each other (vendors, rival telcos). A lot of work goes into to creating the underlying software, the presentation materials, and the stands. So thanks to everyone for your efforts, and congratulations to all our partners who took part in the winning catalysts!#myamdocsvoice #makeitamazing #amdocs #catalyst #winner #tmforum--------------------------------I'm Jonathan Goldberg, part-time #LinkedIn addict, and doing side work as an integration architect 😁 .Follow me for life at Amdocs, TM Forum, and more. Or bell me 🔔 on my profile.

Yom Kippur, the Jewish Day of Atonement, starts on Sunday evening 24th September at sundown.Jews around the world will be fasting for 25+ hours, praying for forgiveness, and introspecting to become better versions of themselves.In the spirit of the day, I hereby ask for forgiveness from anyone whom I have inadvertently offended or upset here on LinkedIn by my posts, comments, or messages. No offence was intended, please accept my sincere apologies.Wishing everyone a (Jewish) year of successful posts, significant engagements, and useful connections.Picture attribution:https://lnkd.in/dXen8-A3Image by pikisuperstar on Freepik#myamdocsvoice #makeitamazing #yomkippur #forgiveness #dayofatonement--------------------------------I'm Jonathan Goldberg, part-time #LinkedIn addict, and doing side work as an integration architect 😁 .Follow me for life at Amdocs, TM Forum, and more. Or bell me 🔔 on my profile.

Bye September 2023Hi June 2024 (perhaps)STOP PRESS - Just after I published this, I learned that Amdocs just won two Moonshot Catalyst awards. Well done team, more to follow from me next week!#DTW23 that's a wrap. My first ever #DTW, and it was (well) Amazing, so thanks Amdocs for sending me to Copenhagen. Difficult to summarize 2.5 intensive days in a short post, but let me try anyway.* The Amdocs booth - looked impressive, unsurprisingly. Actually I tried to keep out of the way as far as possible, to let the professionals get on with the sales and marketing, demos, deal pitches, and whatever other magic Vardit Kuznik Bitan and her marketing aficionados do. But it was good to drop by from time to time and see colleagues from around the world in person, and note that they were doing good business with meetings.* The TMF Innovation Booth and my speaking slot - yes, I gave a short speech on the importance of API standardization, but there was a lot more going on there. Open Digital Architecture (#oda), #OpenAPIs, and other goodies and best practices for the telco industry, including a stand dedicated to ESG* The competition - I spent a lot of Day 2 going round the various booths of vendors, finding out (openly) what's going on. Some people were very happy to talk with me, others were (understandably) more reticent. A common theme from my discussions with our competitors is that (surprise surprise) Generative Artificial Intelligence (#GenAI) is key to success. Whether it's intent-based creation of charging and rating plans in the catalog, or figuring out how to retain your customers by anticipating what issues they might be having, AI is here to stay. My impression is that as distinct to the over-hyping of the metaverse (including at last year's DTW), Gen AI really is poised to make an impact in the communications and digital service industry (and of course in other verticals).* APIs Everywhere - many speaker sessions this DTW were devoted to telcos and vendors explaining how they have used the TMF Open APIs to advance and streamline their business. Vendors proudly displaying their various Open API certification achievements on their booths. And of course TMF published 22 new Gen5 APIs. As a major contributor to the Open API program, this is great news. We're always on the lookout for improvement suggestions, and I was doing an unofficial survey to find out if people had needed to extend APIs or use them as-is. It was about 50:50. I'd be happy to get feedback on how to enhance the API designs.I'll leave you with some commemorative pictures - and we'll see if I get invited to the 2024 event, which has moved to June.#myamdocsvoice #makeitamazing #amdocs #tmf #tmforum #ignite --------------------------------I'm Jonathan Goldberg, part-time #LinkedIn addict, and doing side work as an integration architect 😁 .Follow me for life at Amdocs, TM Forum, and more. Or bell me 🔔 on my profile.

DTWAnother dayAnother trophyProud to collect a Blue ODIE award on behalf of Amdocs from TM Forum at DTW23 - Ignite. This was awarded to us for our contributions to the TMF Open Digital Architecture (ODA) marketplace and the Ready for ODA program.Looking forward to the next target, a Golden ODIE. We didn't manage to make the deadline, so next time. But congratulations to the telcos and vendors who received the golden one already for being ODA Ready.#myamdocsvoice #makeitamazing #amdocs #award #tmf #tmforum #ignite #dtw23 #dtw #catalyst #oda--------------------------------I'm Jonathan Goldberg, part-time #LinkedIn addict, and doing side work as an integration architect 😁 .Follow me for life at Amdocs, TM Forum, and more. Or bell me 🔔 on my profile.

15 minutes of glory(well actually only 10 minutes ...)Here I am, up on the stage at TM Forum DTW23 - Ignite, talking about my recent white paper on the importance of standardization of APIs.For the uninitiated, Application Programming Interface (API) defines how one software component can talk with another, a kind of glue if you will.The #TMF Open API initiative defines a standard for these APIs in the telecommunication world.For example, an order management component can get customer information from a customer management component. The standard ensures that it will be clear how to invoke the get, and what the fields/properties of the customer are.TMF announced yesterday the release of 22 API definitions, the first tranche of the Generation 5 series of Open APIs. Amdocs is proud to have contributed 7 of these APIs (I personally worked on 4 of those). Of course the Open API project, like all standards initiatives, is a cooperative effort. It's been a pleasure to work with colleagues from service providers, other vendors (competitors 😊), and TM Forum focals, to reach this milestone.Take a look here at the Open API production table, and note the APIs that were published in September 2023.https://lnkd.in/dm7P7JiB#myamdocsvoice #makeitamazing #amdocs #tmf #tmforum #ignite #dtw23 #dtw #openapis #standardization --------------------------------I'm Jonathan Goldberg, part-time #LinkedIn addict, and doing side work as an integration architect 😁 .Follow me for life at Amdocs, TM Forum, and more. Or bell me 🔔 on my profile.

🌟 Exciting News! I've Joined the Amdocs   #Ambassador Team! 🚀As an Amdocs Ambassador, I'll be representing a company that's a global leader in tech innovation. I'm excited to connect with professionals, share insights, and explore the latest in technology trends.A huge thanks to Amdocs for this opportunity, and I can't wait to take you all along on this journey with me. Stay tuned for updates! 🌟 #Amdocs #Ambassador

Thrilled to announce that my AI art show is coming to the marketing floor of Amdocs! 🎉✨ With the help of cutting-edge AI technology, I’ve been able to bring my wildest ideas to life and create art that pushes the boundaries of imagination. I’m grateful for the support of my studio team mates who have been instrumental in making this possible. I can’t wait to showcase my work and inspire others with the limitless possibilities of AI. Join me on this incredible journey! #Midjourney  #Amdocs

'" Working from home can be a game-changer, especially when it's pouring outside. I feel grateful for the opportunity to work in a hybrid form, thanks to Amdocs. It truly makes a difference in my life, allowing me to stay productive and connected with my team, no matter the weather. #WorkFromHome #HybridWork #Amdocs #amdocsambassadorsclub #Ambassadors

#reactexpert #softwaretechnicalexpert #UIAre you a React Guru ready to shape the future of web technology? !🥳🎉📣🔓Unlock your potential, shape the future, and grow with us!💫Lead a team of 8-10 React developers, ensuring top-notch UI code quality and standards. 💫focus: specific application modules, offering technical support during solution design and issue resolution.Collaboration is 🗝️! Mentoring the team and influencing product direction through software demos. 📈Continuously driving improvement, using automation and innovation, and leading discussions on products and teams.As part of the team behind Amdocs Catalog, a product centered around React.js, you'll innovate with the latest web technologies, build high-performance web apps, and lead a talented UI team 🙌🧠🌟 📍Raanana, Israel (hybrid work model)Feel free to connect and reach out to me, for more detail!😇 (link in the 1st comment!)#react #reactjs #javascript #UI #userinterface #uidesigner #webdesigner #webapplication #uitrends #interface #designinspiration #webdevelopment #css #html #webframework #Redux #js  #jobopportunity #reactjobs #uiopenjobs #sso #APIGateway #uicodequality #jobalert, #nowhiring, #job, #gethired, #jobfair, #recruiting, #jobopening, #hiring, #joinourteam, #jobs, #jobhiring, #hybridmodel #jobsearching #worklifebalance #makeitamazing Amdocs

2 Years at #Amdocs!On the same day I mark 2 years since I embarked on this adventure - Amdocs also launched her 'Ambassador Club,' which I'm thrilled to be a part of.Not too long ago, my story focused on the transition to the hi-tech industry. Now that I'm 'officially' not only in the 'hi-tech' world but in the 'Amdocs world,' I think it's time to start writing a new story...Ayana Gisser, Thank you for the opportunity.#WorkAnniversary #AmbassadorClub

One of the most valuable things is when the work place allows you learning new things, opening to new domains and invites you to be its embassador!So today Amdocs Embassadors Club has just been launched with great speakers Noa Rosin and Noam Feinholtz, PhD talking about the essentials in the Social media and about how to become a true storyteller.Thanks Amdocs for the continuous opportunity to develop myself, and thank you Ayana Gisser and Gil Rosen for this great initiative!#amdocsambassadorsclubHadar Bismut
